lines: Family and friends are hidden treasures, seek them and enjoy their riches.
author: <Author:0x00007f1ea85e3ad0>

lines: Other things may change us, but we start and end with the family.
author: <Author:0x00007f1ea85e2f90>

lines: All it takes is one good person to restore hope.
author: <Author:0x00007f1ea85e2450>

lines: In every conceivable manner, the family is a link to our past, bridge to our future.
author: <Author:0x00007f1ea85e0510>

lines: Cooperation is the thorough conviction that nobody can get there unless everybody gets there.
author: <Author:0x00007f1ea85e0150>

lines: The strength of the team is each individual member. The strength of each member is the team.
author: <Author:0x00007f1ea861f788>

lines: Talent wins games, but teamwork wins championships.
author: <Author:0x00007f1ea861f508>

lines: Problems can become opportunities when the right people come together.
author: <Author:0x00007f1ea861c448>

lines: When there is teamwork and collaboration, wonderful things can be achieved.
author: <Author:0x00007f1ea861b908>

lines: When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better, too.
author: <Author:0x00007f1ea861a648>

lines: Inspiration exists, but it has to find us working.
author: <Author:0x00007f1ea8617448>

lines: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
author: <Author:0x00007f1ea8616a48>

lines: Light tomorrow with today.
author: <Author:0x00007f1ea86149c8>

lines: Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow.
author: <Author:0x00007f1ea86144c8>

lines: Waste no more time arguing what a good person should be. Be one.
author: <Author:0x00007f1ea8611f48>

lines: What we know matters but who we are matters more.
author: <Author:0x00007f1ea8611908>

lines: Be more concerned with your character than your reputation, because your character is what you really are, while your reputation is merely what others think you are.
author: <Author:0x00007f1ea86108c8>

lines: The truth of your character is expressed through the choice of your actions.
author: <Author:0x00007f1ea86103c8>

lines: Character may be manifested in the great moments, but it is made in the small ones.
author: <Author:0x00007f1ea8610008>

lines: The capacity to care is the thing which gives life its deepest significance.
author: <Author:0x00007f1ea86dfb50>

lines: Taking care is one way to show your love. Another way is letting people take good care of you when you need it.
author: <Author:0x00007f1ea86df650>

lines: I cannot do all the good that the world needs. But the world needs all the good that I can do.
author: <Author:0x00007f1ea86ded90>

lines: Unless someone like you cares a whole awful lot, nothing is going to get better. It's not.
author: <Author:0x00007f1ea86deb10>

lines: Kindness can transform someone’s dark moment with a blaze of light. You’ll never know how much your caring matters. Make a difference.
author: <Author:0x00007f1ea86dc090>

lines: Confidence comes not from always being right, but from not fearing to be wrong.
author: <Author:0x00007f1ea86d9610>

lines: Every small positive change we make in ourselves repays us in confidence in the future.
author: <Author:0x00007f1ea86d6e10>

lines: Never dull your shine for somebody else.
author: <Author:0x00007f1ea86d4ed0>

lines: You have no control over other people's taste, so focus on staying true to your own.
author: <Author:0x00007f1ea86d4b10>

lines: What lies behind you and what lies in front of you pales in comparison to what lies inside you.
author: <Author:0x00007f1ea86d4750>

lines: If you see something beautiful in someone, speak it!
author: <Author:0x00007f1ea86d4110>

lines: Beauty is not in the face; beauty is a light in the heart.
author: <Author:0x00007f1ea86d12d0>

lines: I can't think of any better representation of beauty than someone who is unafraid to be herself.
author: <Author:0x00007f1ea86d03d0>

lines: The sign of a beautiful person is that they always see beauty in others.
author: <Author:0x00007f1ea87ffc88>
